ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: you can always start another necro and have him drp the guild note some where then log on to your chatacter and pick up the guild note to turn in for a new
ygData.messageBody:
you can always start another necro and have him drp the guild note some
where then log on to your chatacter and pick up the guild note to turn
in for a new guild coat or just buy a sr apprentice robe they are
about 4pp

--- stackers@... wrote:
> I am frustrated at my bland look. I lost my Necro
> guild robe early in the game and have yet to find
> some sort of replacement. I have an interest in
> acquiring a robe for a Gnome that will give me an
> EVIL appearance. Give me a tell if you have
> something for me on TUNARE and I will buy....
>
> Roeland
>

===
Salmissra Ravenloft
"The Chosen Ones"
Karana
